article_title: Time Running Out To Solve Growing Doctor Shortage

article_metadata.description: Rep. Allyson Schwartz. It may be too little too late, but it seems as if everyone is taking steps to relieve the doctor shortage. Anyone who has had to find a new primary care physician in the past several years knows how tight the market is for doctors accepting new patients. That [...]
